channel.title: How-To on Cloud Posse Developer Hub
channel.description: Recent content in How-To on Cloud Posse Developer Hub

item.title: Updating Modules for Terraform 0.14
item.description: Updating Cloud Posse Terraform modules for Terraform 0.14 We have some tools you can use for updating our Terraform modules to support Terraform 0.14. This should work for any Terraform modules we have published that currently support Terraform 0.12 or later and contain a context.tf file. Check out/fork the current version of the Terraform module Create a terraform-0.14-upgrade branch and check it out: git checkout -b terraform-0.
